_header: The angel to the Virgin said
Title(s): On the Angelic Salutation; Angelus ad Virginem
_description: John Audelay, On the Angelic Salutation, a translation of Angelus ad Virginem — five 10-line stanzas

BodDou302.First Lines:
The angel to þe vergyn saidEntreng into here
                    boure…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…Heuen blys we may dwel InAfftur thys owtlary
                    Explicit
